CustomField.description: Record the Group By ID determined for the the Pay Transactions based on the value in the Invoice Group By Field. This ID is then used in the grouping of related Invoice Items when Invoices are created
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Record the Group By ID determined for the the Pay Transactions based on the Amount in the Invoice Group By Field. This ID is then used in the grouping of related Invoice Items when Invoices are created
CustomField.label: Invoice Group By ID
